text:
@realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall We must shutdown slaughterhouses, wildlife markets, wet markets, ban trophy hunting, and immoral activities violating animal rights. 

We must be the voice for the voiceless animals. 

#CoronavirusPandemic #StopAnimalCruelty #AnimalRights
#COVID19 #CoronavirusOutbreak
